text: |} The Midsummer Stakes is a Listed flat horse race in Great Britain open to horses aged three years or older. It is run at Windsor over a distance of 1 mile and 31 yards (1,638 metres), and it is scheduled to take place each year in June. The race was first run in 2004. ==Records== Leading jockey (2 wins): *Jamie Spencer – Hazyview (2005), Custom Cut (2014) Leading trainer (3 wins): * Saeed bin Suroor – Librettist (2006), Winged Cupid (2007), French Navy (2013) ==Winners== {| class = "sortable" | border="1" style="border-collapse: collapse; font-size:90%" |- bgcolor="#77dd77" align="center" !
